Sikorsky UH-60 Black Hawk

Since 1978, The Black Hawk helicopter has been the work horse for the U.S. Army, performing troop transport, combat assault, re-supply and many other missions.

By designing a versatile, dependable and rugged rc helicopter replica of the original UH-60 Black Hawk, WebRC pays tribute to one of the most well known and loved helicopters of all time.

FEATURES:

150 ft Range

Multiplayer

Flips & Tricks

20-24 minutes fly time

The Ultimate Outdoor Flying Machine

Choose between 20%, 40%, 60% and 100% power to fly in even the roughest conditions.
